title: Village of Uraman Takht
content: The beautiful village of Uraman or Horaman Takht is located in the south-east of Marivan city. This historical village has been built on a very steep slope in a step-like pattern. In this village, the houses are mostly built of stones. Uraman Takht village stands on the east side of a green valley facing the 2800m mountain of Takht. This village is bigger than the famous village of Masool� in Gillan Province and is, therefore, named as �Hezar Masool�� (Thousands of Masool�). It is worth to be mentioned that though there are many such villages in the provinces of Kermanshah and Kurdestan that are not so well-known and talked of, they have matchless and scenic beauties. This village�s being located on a steep slope, and the steadiness of its houses has given it a significant value in Engineering Geology and Geotechnics.
